actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that nonresident aliens are taxable on gain from the sale or exchange of farming property and undeveloped real property at capital gains rates.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to subject to capital gains taxation the gain from the sale or exchange of farming property and undeveloped real property by a nonresident alien.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that nonresident aliens are taxable on gain from the sale or exchange of farming property and undeveloped real property at capital gains rates.
